dict.acceptation: 庆祝；歌颂，赞扬；公布，展示；

sent.orig: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
sent.trans: 越赞美和享受生活，生活就越值得赞美和享受。

sent.orig: My parents are going to celebrate their twenty-fifth wedding anniversary.
sent.trans: 我父母要庆祝他们的第二十五个结婚纪念日。

sent.orig: Union soldiers began to celebrate. Artillerymen fired their guns to salute the victory over Lee.
sent.trans: 北军开始庆祝打败了李军，炮兵鸣炮志喜。

sent.orig: People celebrate Mardi Gras by dressing up in costumes.
sent.trans: 人们穿上盛装，庆祝油腻的礼拜二。
